mapper.insert: insert into course_audit (user_id, name, author, price, description, sub_name, image_url, content_url) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{author}, #{price}, #{description}, #{subName}, #{imageUrl}, #{contentUrl});
mapper.update: update course_audit set name=#{name}, author= #{author}, price=#{price}, description= #{description}, image_url=#{imageUrl}, content_url=#{contentUrl}, checked=0; where course_id = #{courseId};
mapper.select: select c.course_id, u.username, c.name, c.author, c.price, c.description, c.image_url, c.content_url, c.update_time from user u join course c on u.user_id = c.user_id where c.checked = 0;
